description: {"blocks":[{"key":"13grj","text":"Molecular biologists often use tris-based conduction buffers like TBE or TAE in running DNA gels. These buffers are known to overheat at high voltages, causing problems with gel integrity, sample denaturation and more. The voltage thus needs to be limited to a maximum of 5-10 volts/cm (e.g 100 volts for a 10 cm gel) leading to extended running time, sometimes to hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b23p0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ersu","text":"With 10mM Sodium Tetraborate (CAS#: 1330-43-4, Na2B4O7, Borax), the voltage can be increased to 35 volts/cm without any problem, reducing the time taken to run gels by up to 7 times for standard applications (e.g. separation of DNA fragments from 100 bp - 5 kbp).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":49,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":51,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":53,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m0bv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk7lq","text":"Our lab’s standard DNA gel buffer has become 20 g of Borax into 1 l of water which gives a 20x stock solution. Small gels run in 10-15 minutes at 200V.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6m5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83bra","text":" SCOPE: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fea2j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edjqs","text":"Preparation of gel electrophoresis buffer for separation of DNA fragments from 100 bp - 5 kbp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cdgk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"981vq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50gfn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2m34o","text":"Pour the prepared solution into a clean, labelled screw-top   glass or plastic storage bottle and store at   until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c498j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"4CFC2540C7AF11ECB5DFE9908A85078E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4C832720C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fhamk","text":"Add distilled or de-ionised water to a total of   and stir again for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"71hh9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"2AE9C600C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"305FAAF0C49511EC965E67713EAA503F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jdbt","text":"Add a magnetic flea and use a magnetic stirrer at   to fully dissolve the borax powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bom42","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"170D8B80C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25k0l","text":"Using a   measuring cylinder, measure  of distilled or deionised water and add to the   beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fbccc","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"F6F59A40C23C11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"800","error":false,"guid":"F8EFBC90C23C11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"3795A570C7A811ECB5DFE9908A85078E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15e8m","text":"Pour powder into a graduated   glass beaker or flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpi25","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"ECF099A0C23C11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f597f","text":"1X RapidBuffer solution is now ready for use and can be stored at   for use within one month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"frr6e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E5E97A40C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfbjj","text":"Add approx   distilled or deionised water, sufficient to make up the volume to  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ed4s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"450","error":false,"guid":"CA7C7370C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"D2FC33A0C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qm8g","text":"Use a   measuring cylinder to measure out  of 10X RapidBuffer into a   graduated beaker or flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aknp6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"5EF74620C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"602EDBC0C23D11EC8307DDED4FA3E4E3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"FF033970C7A711ECB5DFE9908A85078E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arfqn","text":"Weigh out a certain amount of borate and place into a vacuum Tupperware half filled with silica beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tdil","text":"place the lid on top and cover tightly, then use the vacuum pump to extract air inside and allow to dry for  at  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":112,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0hvb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4q0n","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s4qt","text":"1.2 Carefully pour it out into zip lock bags and seal to avoid it from absorbing moisture and store in cool dry place.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"F8789A20C49411EC965E67713EAA503F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F348C840C49411EC965E67713EAA503F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

title: Preparing Borax RapidBuffer for electrophoresis
